dampen.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to make something such as a feeling or activity less strong
dampen.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The light rain dampened the crowdâ€™s enthusiasm.
Raising interest rates might dampen the economy.
dampen.translation[0].definitions[2].def: to make a sound or movement less loud or strong
dampen.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: The spring dampens the shock of the impact.
